articles.author: Peter
articles.title: Nintendo Switch OLED launches today, but buyers in the US and Europe report delays - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The revamped console launches today, but most stores don't have it in stock.
articles.content:
The Nintendo Switch OLED is going on sale today or was supposed to, anyway. The pre-orders are over and retailers should be shipping consoles to early buyers, but they are reporting delays.

articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: Russia offered to pump more gas to Europe. But analysts doubt that's ever going to happen - CNBC
articles.description: Market analysts quickly suspected that the offer to increase supplies to Europe was likely intended to put pressure on Germany to certify the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline.
articles.content:
A worker adjusts a pipeline valve at the Gazprom PJSC Slavyanskaya compressor station, the starting point of the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline, in Ust-Luga, Russia, on Thursday, Jan. 28, 2021.
